name: neutralizing-gas

effect.scarlet-violet: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.
effect.the-teal-mask: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.
effect.the-indigo-disk: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

short_effect: Neutralizes abilities of all Pokémon in battle.

flavor_text.the-teal-mask: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon's Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.
